main event: A mysterious object was sighted in the sky over Tatum, New Mexico on September 17, 1951.
interesting points: The object was orange-red in color and larger than a B-29 aircraft.
The object moved slowly and changed direction.
The object reappeared three times, each time for a period of 10 to 15 seconds.
The sighting lasted for a total of 10 to 15 seconds.
The investigating officer could not explain the strange observations.
